overview: The third entry in the landmark Lukas' Story series.  A continuation of the story begun in the Lukas' Stories dvd. When Lukas accepted an invitation for a weekend in the mountains he didn't know that ten other oversexed young men were also invited.  This is the conclusion of the explosive trilogy following the sexual maturing of Lukas, the most beautiful young man to ever appear before a video camera. A secluded chalet, its barn and its hayloft are the perfect settings for several days of erotic fun and games, as the houseguests change partners for a kaleidoscope of couplings.  Our hero's sexual exploration continues all weekend as he watches the houseguests enjoy themselves. Lukas also participates, partnering with a combination of assurance and tenderness.
tagline: Ten fabulous scenes - gorgeous bodies, great looking guys, amazing arses and fat juicy cocks that spurt load after load. We get to see Lukas shoot more times than I could count!
title: Lukas' Story 3
